name: thank you five
description:
thank you five: a game from the hell week that is my life. 

[play in full screen]

Directions:

click the rope to start

use your mouse/WASD to look around

press Q while facing the door to quiet the cast down

press E to turn 180 degrees

press "space" to turn on/off your script light

use the right and left pencils or "Z" and "C" to turn the pages of the script

click buttons to...press those buttons

CREDITS

Hamlet: Steven Frydman

Queen Gertrude: Will Richerson

Lord Polonius: Peter Ferrarase

Director: Lucia Pangan

and a special thank you to Easton Self for animating buttons better than anyone I've ever met <3

[midterm]
